alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 16 at 12:23AM CDT until June 16 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1223 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Loxley, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Loxley around 1235 AM CDT. Robertsdale and Silverhill around 115 AM CDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
